participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Friendly and easy-going, loves to have fun.
participant_1.background: I am in college. I enjoy listening to country music. I enjoy playing video games. I have a crummy job at scrubway. I live life to its fullest.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Caring and enthusiastic about family activities.
participant_2.background: Going to the beach is my favorite past time. I am an american citizen. I love pizza. My son is a football player.

content.text: I love playing video games! What do you enjoy playing?
I love playing video games too! I love playing Mario and Animal Crossing.
I love Animal Crossing! I have a town on my Switch.
That's awesome! I have a town on my Nintendo 3DS.
I've been playing a lot of Mario Kart lately.
I love Mario Kart! It's so much fun to play with friends.
I agree! It's so much fun to race each other and see who can get the best time.
I'm not very good at it, but I still have fun.
That's all that matters! It's not about winning, it's about having fun.
I agree! I love playing video games because it's a fun way to relax and have fun.
I agree! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who enjoys the same things you do.
I agree! I hope we can play video games together sometime.
That would be fun! I'm always up for a good game of Mario Kart.
Great! I'll give you my friend code.
